oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Redd Harper's Hollywood Roundup - Program #258 - Part 1 + 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of Redd Harper's Hollywood Roundup. Listed as program number 258 parts one and two. Labeled as part of the Armed Forces Radio Series EN-81. Recording features Redd Harper (entertainer), the Ozark Mountain Boys (performance group), Hank Thompson (performer), Freddie DeVares (performer), and Frankie Messina (performer). Recording is from an unknown date.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Redd Harper; The Ozark Mountain Boys; Hank Thompson; Freddie DeVares; Frankie Messina
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Opening Theme [featuring Redd Harper voiceover] -- (01:12) Take Me Back to Tulsa (Ozark Mountain Boys) -- (02:56) Harper and Wade Ray joke about Tulsa -- (03:34) Rounded Up in glory (Redd Harper) -- (05:15) Harper introduces Hank Thompson -- (05:32) Hangover Heart (Hank Thompson) -- (07:30) Harper and Thompson discuss Thompson's goat farm -- (08:54) Are You Fer That? (Ozark Mountain Boys) -- (10:54) Harper and Thompson discuss Thompson's goat farm -- (12:17) Paradise Isle (Freddie DeVares) [unconfirmed]-- (13:49) Harper and Thompson discuss Thompson's prize goat -- (15:00) Margie (Ozark Mountain Boys) -- (17:50) -- (07:30) Harper and Thompson discuss Thompson's goats -- (18:41) Love thief (Hank Thompson) -- (21:10) Harper and Thompson discuss Thompson's goats -- (22:07) About Face [featuring Frankie Messina on the accordion] (Ozark Mountain Boys) -- (23:57) Harper and Thompson discuss Thompson's goats -- (24:15) What's Cooking on the Hollywood Range (Redd Harper) -- (25:38) That Beautiful Picture (Hank Thompson) -- (27:40) Thompson and Harper give their thanks and urge the audience to go to church -- (28:03) Closing Theme [featuring Redd Harper voiceover]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Harper, Redd, 1903-1992; Thompson, Hank; Ray, Wade, 1913-1998;
